full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DPAL LDAN LHA MO 'KHOR DANG BCAS RNAMS LA LHA KHANG RTEN GSUM MCHOD RDZAS MI NOR LONGS SPYOD RNAMS BCOL ZHING GNYER DU GTAD PA BZHUGS, ,
